summary: Frontend testing completed for redesigned SEIZURES ALGORITHM section. All 9 features verified working: Login, Navigation to Epilepsy tab, SEIZURES ALGORITHM section visibility, Yes/No branches with distinct colors (green/red), Box 1 with 3 criteria and bullet points, Box 2 with A/B/C details, Signs during seizure panel with 5 items, and sub-branches for 'still seizing > 5 min'.

tests: Medical disclaimer modal with 'I Agree' dismisses correctly
Children dashboard accessible via home page
Select Epilepsy - Including Status (SMC) via data-testid='tab-epilepsy'
Section has gradient background and rounded border
Abnormal movement start box (rounded blue pill)
'is it a seizure?' decision box with 'refer to box 1'
No/Yes branches visible with connecting lines
Box 1 title: 'Box 1. Criteria of common seizures'
3- Should follow the rules of generalized/focal seizures
Bullet: Unilateral seizure → patient conscious or unconscious
Blood details: Blood gas, electrolytes, glucose, CBC, medication levels
NO branch: 1- Observe for 2 hours, 2- Follow up blood collection
YES branch: follow the status epilepticus algorithm

critical_code_review_comments: SEIZURES ALGORITHM redesign successfully implements all required features
Color contrast between Yes (green) and No (red) branches is clear and distinct
Yellow reference boxes (Box 1, Box 2) positioned correctly on right side with complete content
Signs during seizure panel (orange) contains all 5 items as specified
Flowchart arrows and connectors properly styled with blue color
Text sizes appear larger and more readable compared to typical flowchart implementations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Test path: Login > Accept 'I Agree' disclaimer > Home > Children card > Navigate to /children/approaches > Select 'Epilepsy - Including Status (SMC)' from dropdown. The SEIZURES ALGORITHM section is in EpilepsyApproach.jsx lines 34-278 and includes: 1) Abnormal movement start box, 2) is it a seizure decision, 3) Yes/No branches with distinct colors (green/red), 4) Yellow Box 1 and Box 2 panels on right side, 5) Orange Signs during seizure panel with 5 items, 6) Sub-branches for still seizing > 5 min with complete content for both Yes and No paths.
